entry.title: Can You Smoke Weed on Birth Control?
entry.summary: Since marijuana is still illegal under federal law, scientific research is very limited. Because of the way cannabis interacts with the human body’s endocannabinoid system, certain studies suggest that CBD may be beneficial for those who take birth control, while THC may present an increased risk for others. Further research will surely lead us to [...]

entry.title: What is Rick Simpson Oil?
entry.summary: Created in a Canadian hospital, Rick Simpson Oil (RSO) is a cannabis oil known for its medical benefits, including relieving some cancer symptoms. entry.title: Does Weed Make You Tired?

Certain cannabinoids have relaxing and soothing effects and can even make falling asleep easier.
